items.sentence: It wasn't until the next morning that we learned that Tom had been killed.
The vandals smashed all the windows and knocked all the garbage cans over.
Tom saw a man wearing a hat standing next to Mary and wondered who he was.
The first time I saw this movie was years ago at a drive-in movie theater.
I would like to upload several photos to the forum. Could you tell me how?
As soon as Tom got on the train, the doors closed, and it started to move.
There usually aren't this many cars on the road this early in the morning.
I have to turn in an essay tomorrow and I haven't even started writing it.
I tried to convince Tom to do that, but he said that he wasn't interested.
Tom has become better at playing the clarinet since I last heard him play.
